(12) 40–28 ==Playoffs== ===Central Division Tiebreaker=== Fort Wayne Pistons vs. Chicago Stags: Pistons win series 1-0 *Game 1 @ Fort Wayne: Fort Wayne 86, Chicago 69 ===Central Division Semifinals=== *(2) Rochester Royals vs. (3) Fort Wayne Pistons: Pistons win series 2-0 *Game 1 @ Rochester: Fort Wayne 90, Rochester 84 *Game 2 @ Fort Wayne: Fort Wayne 79, Rochester 78 (OT) ===Central Division Finals=== *Central Division: (1) Minneapolis Lakers vs. (3) Fort Wayne Pistons: Lakers win series 2-0 *Game 1 @ Minneapolis: Minneapolis 93, Fort Wayne 79 *Game 2 @ Fort Wayne: Minneapolis 89, Fort
